description:
Ever wonder how to became successful web designer or web developer?

Everything starts with HTML and CSS, and it is very important to learn HTML5 and CSS3 elements so Web sites that you will build can be modern, and most important responsive and good looking.

Why choose this course:

  • This course is your beginning how to became a successful web designer and web developer.
  • You will learn HTML5 elements and how to include them on the Web site
  • You will learn how to combine HTML5 and CSS3
  • You will learn how to download Bootstrap and how to include elements in your Web site
  • You will learn how to make your Web sire responsive
  • I've created hundreds Web sites with HTML5 and CSS3 elements and I want to give you lots of great advices

At the end of the course, together we will build modern HTML and CSS3 responsive Web site with Bootstrap elements.

I will pass on tips that have helped me to become a successful web developer.

Presentation of the entire course at the end you can download in PDF format.
title: HTML5, CSS3 & Bootstrap - How to Create a Responsive Website
